snippet.title: Glory Hunters - Official Trailer | Latin American Games Showcase
snippet.description:
Glory Hunters is an all-new action-adventure RPG using retro handheld graphics with a unique and original twist: you progress through the game by obtaining achievements. Check out the Glory Hunters trailer to see this retro world, dungeons, enemies you'll fight, and more. Glory Hunters is available now on PC (itch.io) and Game Boy.

#IGN #Gaming
